dialogues.speaker: Narrator
dialogues.text: The game begins in a small, quiet village.

dialogues.speaker: NPC
dialogues.text: That's what it seems, but our village has been haunted by a terrible beast.

dialogues.speaker: Player
dialogues.text: Point me in the direction of the beast. I will deal with it.

dialogues.speaker: NPC
dialogues.text: Bless you, brave warrior. It dwells in the forest just beyond the northern hills.
